ComicInfo.Summary: A fantastic jumping-on point for new readers! Frank "Madman" Einstein thinks he has lost everything he loves and must find some way to get it all back. Is it as simple as pushing a cosmic "reset button" and taking his vitamins? Find out in this exciting issue!
ComicInfo.Title: Find a Penny Pick It Up; Film Flam
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mike Allred,Nick Dragotta,Michael Allred,Nick Dragotta,Michael Allred
